description: A comprehensive text processing GUI and MCP server with 33+ tools for text transformation, encoding, extraction, and AI integration.
rules: Run Pomera as an MCP server with: python pomera.py --mcp-server
All 33 MCP tools are prefixed with 'pomera_' (e.g., pomera_case_transform, pomera_base64)
Configure MCP clients by adding Pomera to mcp.json with command 'python' and args pointing to pomera.py
Use the Notes tools (pomera_notes_save, pomera_notes_get, etc.) for persistent data storage
Text processing tools accept input text and return processed output - chain them for complex workflows
For Cursor integration, add configuration to ~/.cursor/mcp.json
The GUI application can be launched directly with: python pomera.py
